content: This message came to me concerning Tyre:
For seventy years, the length of a king’s life, Tyre will be forgotten. But then the city will come back to life as in the song about the prostitute:
Yes, after seventy years the  will revive Tyre. But she will be no different than she was before. She will again be a prostitute to all kingdoms around the world.
But in the end her profits will be given to the . Her wealth will not be hoarded but will provide good food and fine clothing for the ’s priests.
